QueryResult.text: SELECT te.prID time_entry_id, s.slice_date date_worked, SUM(s.slice) hours_worked FROM prTimeEntry te INNER JOIN prTimeSheet ts ON te.prTimeSheetID = ts.prID INNER JOIN prj_blb_slices s ON te.prID = s.prj_object_id INNER JOIN prj_blb_slicerequests sr ON s.slice_request_id = sr.id WHERE (sr.request_name = 'DAILYRESOURCETIMECURVE') GROUP BY te.prID, s.slice_date
